author: nick.ghita
content: <@553610810652622860> The bridge node api spec <@!296630428754771968> wrote up has been merged into the stateless ethereum spec. Just letting you know since it was mentioned in yesterday's sync, here's a link: https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/blob/master/portal-bridge-nodes.md

author: pipermerriam
content: @tim new time set and invite sent to you.  If anyone didn't receive a calendar invite who wants one please DM me with the email address you'd like me to send it to

author: pipermerriam
content:
I think we have one open question about the use of DiscV5 (and underlying UDP).  What does NAT hole punching look like.  What restrictions are we going to be stuck with by default?  Is it going to be possible for two nodes that are both behind a NAT to establish a connection? 

Stumbled across this a while back: https://samy.pl/pwnat/
